summary: A drama centered on the Korean War's final battle that will determine the border between north and south.
cast: Ha-kyun Shin|Soo Go|Seung-su Ryu|Chang-Seok Ko|Lee Jehoon|Jin-woong Cho|In-gi Jeong|Seung-ryong Ryu|Ok-bin Kim|Yeong-seo Park|Seo Joon-Yeol|Seung-min Woo|Min Choi|Jo Min-ho|Rok-kyeong Kim|Han Seong-Yong|Jang In-ho|Su-ho Ha|Seong-cheol Ha|Lee Da-wit|Min Su Yoon
title: Go-ji-jeon
